name: Mechabot Defender
description:
Mechabot Defender is a casual tower defense arcade game where you can pick up and move your towers in real-time!



In Mechabot Defender, you will control a character in real-time; avoiding enemies, dynamically positioning your two unique turrets, and upgrading those turrets throughout a run.



These enemies aren't all cannon fodder! Enemies will hide behind nearby shields, support units will keep the enemy horde in the fight, and some enemies will even steal ammo right from your turrets! But don't worry, there's still plenty of cannon fodder for you to destroy.



Features:
- "Bullet" Hell gameplay where the enemies are the bullets.
- Tower Defence mechanics: your turrets are your weapons.
- Upgrade your turrets separately and create two completely unique synergies!
- Several unique enemies with their own behaviours and gimmicks.
- Entirely optional lore to be unlocked!
- And more to come!
